title: What Made 'Squid Game' Such a Hit?
description:
Mallory Rubin and Joanna Robinson discuss how the South Korean thriller ‘Squid Game’ became a massive international phenomenon, what it means for Netflix, and why it worked so well.
Host: Mallory Rubin
Guest: Joanna Robinson
Producer: Isaac Lee
